title: Which US city is mentioned in the most songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: The 10 most sung about places in the world: New York, USA – 161 songsLondon, UK – 102 songsLos Angeles, USA – 87 songsCalifornia, USA – 68 songsHollywood, USA – 66 songsParis, France – 52 songsMiami, USA – 46 songsNew Orleans, USA – 43 songsBrooklyn, USA – 38 songsRome, Italy – 30 songs
